attributes.action: Make the plastic covering on birthday cards out of biodegradable paper.
attributes.additional_details:
Help stop this; "Record numbers of animals are killed or injured by plastic litter as the RSPCA reveals it was called to 579 incidents involving rubbish in just one year" - Daily Mail

Make a change. Make a change for the better!
attributes.background: It's Time. It's time to save our planet and we need to make some changes - one easy one being just simply swapping the plastic wrap on birthday cards for something like biodegradable brown paper/plastic. It's easy to do and in the long term it's Sustainable - Sign up and help out a future generation
